content: Hi all, we have different departments and each department has different Services. Those Services consists of mutliple teams(Organizations). HealthcareService has an element to capture this. But it is not possible to select mutliple teams using HealthcareService.provideBy(0..1). Can anyone suggest how to capture this? Thank you.
This would be multiple healthcare services, as each location is also likely to have different contact details, availability data and practitioners that work there.
